mapper.insert: insert into movie_mst values( 0, #{movie_code}, #{movie_title_kor}, #{movie_title_eng}, #{movie_genre}, #{movie_limited_age}, #{movie_description}, #{movie_director}, #{movie_actors}, #{movie_runtime}, #{movie_poster_img}, #{movie_trailer_mp4}, #{movie_release_date}, #{movie_close_date}, now(), now() );
